p: The rest of the studies are listed in Table 9. In summary, three groups of researchers have made the greatest number of scientific contributions. The first group, from the Faculty of Medicine of Turkey, evaluated the protective effect of ethanolic extracts of Turkish propolis (EETP) against DNA damage induced by H 2O 2 [ 189] and Î³-rays [ 190] in fibroblast cells using the comet assay. The results of both experiments showed a significant reduction of the damage generated by thegenotoxic agents in the cultures treated with the extract. Their findings suggest that the chemopreventive activity of EETP may occur under different mechanisms, including the antioxidant action.
